text: Alderman Samuel Gardiner MBE JP (24 March 1940 â€“ 8 November 2022) was a Unionist politician in Northern Ireland for the Ulster Unionist Party and was a MLA for Upper Bann. Gardiner died on 8 November 2022, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ulster Unionist members of the Northern Ireland Assembly
